title: Kedamono Shounen Shoujo
sinopse:
Enatsu works on Toba-kun, who has no interest in girls, to make love with her. She is surprised that Toba-kun acts like a beast the moment she throws herself into his arms.

(Source: M-U)

Included one-shots: Hidarite no Renai Housoku; Kare no Taion, Kanojo no Toiki; Pin Up Boy
